ac.uk.nottingham.ningboport.controller

Class LocalDataManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ac.uk.nottingham.ningboport.controller.LocalDataManager

  • public class LocalDataManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides method to update session and task list, and also provides methods to return session and tasks objects. There will be only one instance of LocalDataManager in the application.
    Author:
    Jiaqi LI

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static LocalDataManager getInstance()
        If no instance exists, than a new LocalDataManager is created and returned, otherwise the existed one is returned.
        Returns:
        the instance of DataManager

      • update

        public void update(XMLLoginComm resp)
        Update session
        Parameters:
        resp - the response of login request as an XMLLoginComm object. XMLLoginComm ensures the response is valid, hence no further validation needed here.

      • update

        public void update(XMLDataResponse resp)
        Update tasks. Do all possible actions - add, update and delete. It is server's response to provide fully detailed ordered instructions on how to update task list, invalid sequence will be ignored.
        Parameters:
        resp - the response of update request as an XMLDataResponse object. XMLDataResponse ensures the response is valid, hence no further validation needed here.

      • getTasks

        public java.util.ArrayList<XMLTask> getTasks()
        Get array of tasks.
        Returns:
        the ArrayList of XMLTask objects.

      • getSession

        public XMLSession getSession()
        Get session
        Returns:
        session as a XMLSession object.

      • getAndroidTasks

        public java.util.ArrayList<AndroidTaskItem> getAndroidTasks()
        Build and return an ArrayList of AndroidTaskItem objects. This is for UI display purposes.
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of AndroidTaskItem representation of tasks.
